about_the_game:
Long forgotten in the depths of the toy chest, Teddy—a loyal and courageous knight—is called to action. As chaos spreads across the toy world, driven by the vengeful Baba Yaga plushie and her sinister army, it’s up to Teddy to rise, face the darkness, and fight through haunted toys to restore peace to the realm of playthings!

Physics-Powered Combat

Engage in fast-paced, physics-based battles that require strategy and reflexes, pushing enemies off platforms and knocking them back to the bottom of the toy chest. Each room offers unique opportunities for creative takedowns!

Dash, Bounce, and Chain Combos

Inspired by Smash Bros, Teddy Knight introduces bouncy physics to combat, letting you launch enemies in every direction and chain them into thrilling combo attacks.

Customize your playstyle

Collect powerful upgrades, items, and abilities that allow you to build a unique approach to combat. Experiment with different strategies to match your playstyle and take on increasingly challenging foes.

Progress through the sinister depths of the toy chest, where forgotten toys create a world full of mystery. Each area offers unique challenges, hidden secrets, and an atmosphere that grows darker and more threatening as you progress.

Rediscover each level in Nightmare Mode, where the difficulty ramps up and the atmosphere takes on an even darker, more ominous tone. Conquer this mode to unlock new abilities, challenges, and rewards.

Are you ready to brave the toy chest and face the darkness within? Grab your hammer, take a deep breath, and prepare to dash, bounce, and conquer in Teddy Knight!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8750H CPU @ 2.20GHz
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Step into the paws of an unlikely hero and journey through the toy chest! In Teddy Knight, a physics-based action roguelite, you play as Teddy, a brave stuffed knight on a mission to save the toy world from evil. Engage in fast-paced combat with unique “bounce” mechanics in a dark toy universe.
